name: tsoa-tests
description: Build swagger-compliant REST APIs using TypeScript and Node

scripts.pretest: yarn clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=tsoa_test ts-node --require tsconfig-paths/register ./prepare.ts
scripts.loading-msg-for-tests: echo '... starting a test run to ensure quality. Note this takes some time as tests do not run in parallel (by design) ...'
scripts.test:unit: node ../ensureYarn.js && yarn pretest && tsc -b tsconfig.build.json && yarn loading-msg-for-tests && cross-env NODE_ENV=tsoa_test mocha 'unit/**/*.spec.ts' --exit --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --timeout 5000
scripts.test:integrate: node ../ensureYarn.js && yarn pretest && tsc -b tsconfig.build.json && yarn loading-msg-for-tests && cross-env NODE_ENV=tsoa_test mocha 'integration/**/*.spec.ts' --exit --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --timeout 5000
